problems.title: Longest Duplicate Substring (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given a string s, consider all duplicated substrings: (contiguous) substrings of s that occur 2 or more times. Return any duplicated substring that has the longest possible length. If s does not have a duplicated substring, return "".

Input Format:
First line: string s.

Output Format:
Print the longest duplicated substring.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
banana

Sample Output
ana
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
